reviewText:
This DVD provides you one full hour of instruction with Paulina, then a 30 min. workout with Jindra with pure bellydance moves), and two performances at the end.  This video is just wonderful, Paulina & Jindra are great instructors and not only great dancers!!
I would recommend it for the absolute beginner or for someone who wants to excel her foundation.

You can watch a preview in: [...]

Have fun!!
